function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Nurses experiencing psychological problems during COVID-19","Impact":"Decreased mental health, reduced resilience to stress, decreased job performance","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, counseling, and resources for nurses, improve work conditions and communication","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps, communication tools","People":"Nurses, healthcare personnel","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Fear of infection leading to panic emotions, anxiety, and depression","Impact":"Decreased mental health, reduced job performance, potential for burnout","Mitigation":"Provide accurate information, training, and education on infection control, promote a culture of support and understanding","Technologies":"Online training modules, video conferencing for communication, mental health apps","People":"Nurses, healthcare personnel","Owner":"Hospital management, nursing directors"},{"Description":"Insufficient nursing knowledge about the coronavirus","Impact":"Increased fear of exposure, anxiety, and worry","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive education and training on COVID-19, enhance knowledge sharing and communication among nursing staff","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, knowledge management systems, video conferencing for education","People":"Nurses, nursing staff","Owner":"Hospital management, nursing directors"}]}
